Title: START
Description: Input list numslist, compute n = len(numslist)

Title: Loop i
Description: For i in range(n-1): Try removing adjacent pair (i, i+1)

Title: Create new
Description: new = [] (empty list to store remaining elements)

Title: Inner loop j
Description: For j in range(n): if j == i or j == i+1 skip else append numslist[j] to new

Title: Continue
Description: If not sorted: continue loop to next adjacent pair
